text: Bicton is a village and civil parish in Shropshire, England. According to the 2001 census it had a population of 890, increasing to 1,092 at the 2011 Census. The village is about three miles north-west of Shrewsbury town centre and includes part of Montford Bridge. The parish includes the small primary Bicton school. ==See also== *Listed buildings in Bicton, Shrewsbury ==References== ==External links== *Parish webpage *Photos of Bicton and surrounding area on geograph.org.uk Category:Villages in Shropshire Category:Civil parishes in Shropshire
title: Bicton, Shrewsbury
